text:
The preschool teachers are incredibly caring and loving, especially the director Ms Peh Woon has a heart of gold. They are truly child-oriented and prioritize the well-being of the children over profit.

Best is they made an effort to update most activities through the app, ensuring you won‚Äôt miss any events or milestones your kids achieve, while also staying on top of their academic progress!

Well done, teachers! Your efforts and love truly make a difference!

My son has been with the school for a year now. The teachers and the environment is really nice and my son enjoys it thoroughly. They have a wonderful app to share the check ins and check outs of my son and all the little memories and activities he has been doing as photos etc. I highly recommend the school.

My daughter has been with the school for a year plus and so far my girl is enjoying school. The school has provided updates on my girl's progress and areas of improvement which I appreciate, and my girl likes the activities/ celebrations that are organised by the school üëç
My child has made a lot of progress since entering school. Thank you for your careful instruction and patience.
